sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './FoodItem.css' import {assets} from '../assets/assets' const FoodItem = ({id, name, price, description, image}) => { const [itemCount, setItemCount] = useState(0); const {cartItem, addToCart, removeFromCart} = useContext(Store) return (
{ !itemCount ? setItemCount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_white} alt="" /> :
setItemCount(prev=>prev-1)} src={assets.remove_icon_red} alt="" />

{itemCount}

setItemCount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_green} alt="" />
}

{name}

{description}

${price}

) } export default FoodItem
